overview: Cruising Confidentialâ€™, a steamy and provocative weekly podcast, has skyrocketed to the top of the streaming charts in no small part because of its stunning host Derek Kage and his deeply resonant voice. From the minds of award-winning director Tony Dimarco and acclaimed screenwriter Ben Rush, this immersive new feature takes you inside the world of this wildly descriptive podcast and its true stories of fiery hook-ups and down-and-dirty cruising.
title: Cruising Confidential
